cohortName: [PL 31317001] Dysphagia referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (31317) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 31317002] Dysphagia referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (31317) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 31317003] Dysphagia incident cohort: First occurrence of Dysphagia and Difficulty swallowing descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Dysphagia at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
